text: K. Ramnoth (1912â€“1956) was an Indian cinematographer and director. He worked in Tamil cinema. == Movies == === As director === * Kathanayaki (1955) * Rihaee (1954) * Sugam Enge (1954) * Viduthalai (1954) * Manithan (1953) * Thai Ullam (1952) * Ek Tha Raja (1951) * Marmayogi (1951) * Beedala Patlu (1950) * Ezhai Padum Padu (1950) * Kanniyin Kaadhali (1949) * Paduka Pattabhishekham (1936) * Markandeya (1935) === As cinematographer only === * Oka Talli Pillalu (1953) * Kanchana (1952) * Beedala Patlu (1950) * Kalpana (1948) * Chandralekha (1948) * Mangamma Sapatham (1943) * Bhakta Potana (1942) * Devatha (1941) * Sumangali (1940) * Vande Mataram (1939) * Gruhalakshmi (1938) * Sasirekha Parinayam (1936) * Seeta Kalyanam (1934) == References == Category:1956 deaths Category:1912 births Category:Indian cinematographers Category:Articles with hCards
title: K. Ramnoth
